page.title: 06DOWNE VILLAGE
page.content:
DOWNE VILLAGE
In Downe there are four mansions and a number of smaller old houses and cottages. There is a small estate of newer houses built in 1970. In the middle of the landscap and buildings is a lime tree with a bench around it; sometimes people who are waiting for the bus sit there. There is a Crystals minibus service and a single decker bus service to Bromley. Downe has two pubs and a restaurant. People come to Downe to walk round the many footpaths, go horse riding, visit Downe House or High Elms. The only shops are a newsagents and a post office with a food store. There is a small primary school, a parish church and a Baptist church.
